CareDiagnosis.name: CareDiagnosis
CareDiagnosis.description: Represents the details of a diagnosis including code type, name, and description. One or more care diagnoses can be associated with a care request.

CareRequestCaseId.description: Case related to the care request.

CodeTypeIdentifier.description: ID of the code type for the diagnosis.

DiagnosisCodeId.description: Diagnosis code. DiagnosisCodeId will be deprecated in a future release, so use DiagnosisCodeSetId instead.

DischargeCodeDescription.description: Description of the discharge diagnosis code.

DischargeCodeType.description: Code type for the discharge diagnosis.

DischargeCodeTypeIdentifier.description: ID of the code type for the discharge diagnosis.

DischargeDiagnosisEffectiveDate.description: Effective date for the discharge diagnosis.

DischargeDiagnosisEndDate.description: Termination date for the discharge diagnosis.

DischrgeDiagnosisCodeSetId.description: The code set associated with the discharge diagnosis.

HealthConditionId.description: The health condition that's associated with the member.

IsDischargeDiagnosisPrimary.description: Indicates whether this is the primary discharge diagnosis.

IsModifiedDiagnosisPrimary.description: Indicates whether this modified diagnosis is the primary diagnosis.

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether this diagnosis is the primary diagnosis.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ModifiedCodeType.description: Code type for the modified diagnosis.

ModifiedCodeTypeIdentifier.description: ID of the code type for the modified diagnosis.

ModifiedDiagnosisCodeId.description: ID of the code type for the modified diagnosis. ModifiedDiagnosisCodeId will be deprecated in a future release, so use ModifiedDiagnosisCodeSetId instead.

ModifiedDiagnosisCodeSetId.description: Modified diagnosis code set associated with the diagnosis.

ModifiedEffectiveDate.description: Modified effective date for the diagnosis.

ModifiedEndDate.description: Modified termination date for the diagnosis.

PresentOnAdmission.description: Specifies if the health condition was present at the time of member admission.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type assigned to this object.

SourceSystem.description: System from which this request was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the request was sourced.

SourceSystemModified.description: Timestamp of the most recent update from the source system.
